properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 20 at 2:18AM PST until January 21 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 10 to 15 kt and
seas 9 to 13 feet at 17 seconds. For the Gale Warning, south
winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 14 to 19 feet
at 19 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM and Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence
OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10 PM
PST Tuesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM PST this
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY
